definition: name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: As she changed out of her lycra costume, she reminisced .
sentences.chinese: 正如她改變了她的萊卡服裝，她回憶了。

sentences.english: The two met in the "Lycra my show"contest.
sentences.chinese: 他兩在萊卡我型我秀的比賽中相遇了。

sentences.english: I had invested so much in my Hasselblad system, and my Leica M6 set.
sentences.chinese: 我投了很多錢在哈蘇系統和萊卡M6套機上。

sentences.english: One exciting new technology is apparel made from Leather with LYCRA.
sentences.chinese: 一個令人興奮的新技術是由皮革服裝與萊卡的。

sentences.english: Shirts made of lycra or other form fitting material that will reduce wind resistance.
sentences.chinese: 襯衫了萊卡或其他形式裝修材料，減少風的阻力。

sentences.english: Laca elastic woven cloth has become a new favorite in dress trade.
sentences.chinese: 萊卡彈力機織布，已成爲服飾行業中的一個新寵。

sentences.english: Fabrics choose cotton lycra mix, elastic and tension, comfort high.
sentences.chinese: 棉加萊卡的面料選擇，彈性和張力，舒適性高。

sentences.english: The Diners Club Card was initially made of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 大萊卡最初是用厚紙板做的。

sentences.english: It also owns Invista, which is the world's largest manufacturer of Nylon and the maker of Lycra.
sentences.chinese: 它還擁有世界上最大的尼龍和萊卡製造公司，金威達。

sentences.english: Laika was the first living thing to fly around the Earth in Nov.
sentences.chinese: 萊卡是第一個飛上太空的地球生物。

sentences.english: But avoid wearing tight lycra and nylon exercise outfits.
sentences.chinese: 但避免穿緊萊卡和尼龍運動服飾。

sentences.english: Zuleikha felt in the name Joseph.
sentences.chinese: 祖萊卡覺得是以約瑟之名。

sentences.english: I’ve also got cotton and lycra mix, if you want.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要的話，我們還有棉加萊卡的。

sentences.english: Everybody knows that in Russia bears walk around the streets and play balalaika .
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道，在俄羅斯熊走在街上和發揮巴拉萊卡。

sentences.english: But avoid wearing tight lycra and nylon exercise outfits.
sentences.chinese: 但避免穿緊萊卡和錦綸演習衣服。

definition: (of a garment) designed to be put on by pulling it over one's head (like a sweater or T-shirt etc)
ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
ommatidium (single component of insect's compound eye)/one eye (i.e. one's left or right eye)
derailment/to jump the track (of train)/to derail
